original_title: Who Will Find What the Finders Hide?
overview: An hour long documentary about the Finders 'cult'. The group received very very brief attention in the 80's after its odd activities were thought to be related to Satanic child sex abuse, and possible trafficking. Connections between US Military Intelligence, Hong Kong, and the members was uncovered in an investigation, and then quickly re-covered, and abandoned.
title: Who Will Find What the Finders Hide?
